title: Unicorns of Love; Hype or Genuine Potential?
body:
How do other feel about them?
I really loved their TSM games, and I guess they were'y completely useless in the 2nd game against C9.
I hope they continue to grow throughout this season of LCS.

replies.body: Really love the play of Unicorns of Love. Their top laner is a beast and definitely a top tier talent. I think they have a lot of potential, I just hope they keep bringing out unique champions

I was loving Power of Evil.
Real shame they didn't get enough vision control in their first game against C9; I wanted to see the brilliant Lux lasers going off!

> [{quoted}](name=Mere Intricacy,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=znfr6bpy,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2014-12-12T02:07:10.364+0000)
> I was loving Power of Evil.
> Real shame they didn't get enough vision control in their first game against C9; I wanted to see the brilliant Lux lasers going off!

ayy lomo, meres back

maybe because most og gder left lel
{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}
Their jungler although he plays off-meta champs is so good with his general awareness and map pressure
Any team called "Unicorns of Love" is a team with potential. That name has the potential to snowball on its own.
